title: Murder That Sparked a Brazilian Political Revolution
story: [dramatic] João Pessoa’s assassination in 1930 was no ordinary crime—it ignited a political firestorm! This influential Brazilian lawmaker was gunned down, leading to whispers of a conspiracy among rival factions. His death didn’t just claim a life; it sparked a coup that reshaped Brazil’s political landscape. Over 300,000 supporters took to the streets, demanding justice and change. The fallout? A regime change that would influence Brazil for decades. How did one man’s murder turn into a nationwide upheaval? [pause:0.5s]
description: João Pessoa's assassination led to a coup that changed Brazil forever. What really happened? #BrazilHistory #PoliticalRevolution #JoãoPessoa
